titles.title: National Park System Uniform Penalty Amendment Act
A bill to provide for uniform penalties for violating regulations within the National Park System, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 8/3/2006--Introduced. National Park System Uniform Penalty Amendment Act - Provides for uniform penalties, enforced by the Secretary of the Interior, for violations of certain rules and regulations relating to the National Park System which may occur at a park, site, monument, memorial, or an area that is part of such System.
